name: Jumping Chicken Ultra Extreme!
description:
Controls: A, D and MOUSE (basically everything is clickable, try it!)

Eggs make small chickens. Small chickens grow into big chickens. Chicken lay eggs, as is inherent to their nature.

Level 1: Get one chicken into the cage on the top left (click on the rope)
Level 2: Fry some eggs in the pan to the left (click the handle)
Level 3: Give the aliens 3 little chickens as a present

After that is just freeplay mode. Have fun!
